fields.value: 2MASS extinction map of the Pipe Nebula

dsDescriptionValue.value: The entire NICER and NICEST extinction maps (with associated data) of the Pipe nebula.  The maps are updated versions of the ones described in Lombardi et al. (2006), and are based on the 2MASS point source catalog.  The maps have a pixel size of 30 arcsec, and a FWHM resolution of 1 arcmin.

publicationCitation.value: Lombardi M., Alves J., Lada C.J. (2006) "2MASS wide field extinction maps. I. The Pipe nebula", A&A 454, 781
